---

I've convinced myself this is large but not unreviewable. However I am absolutely happy to split this up on request.

The doc-module for `script/declarations_diff.sh` contains some details about this script.

</details>

---

<details><summary>Decrease in tech debt: (relative, absolute) = (1.00, 0.00)</summary>

|Current number|Change|Type|
|-:|:-:|:-|
|3029|-1|porting notes|
|1218|-1|erw|

Current commit [8c17e840a2](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/commit/8c17e840a298c3141ac5259fc1e848da223e66e5)
Reference commit [4d34d06eee](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/commit/4d34d06eee44aef6cc0a615fda7476be134d766c)

You can run this locally as
```
./scripts/technical-debt-metrics.sh pr_summary
```
* The `relative` value is the weighted *sum* of the differences with weight given by the *inverse* of the current value of the statistic.
* The `absolute` value is the `relative` value divided by the total sum of the inverses of the current values (i.e. the weighted *average* of the differences).
</details>

```suggestion
theorem span_singleton_eq_bot : (R ∙ x) = ⊥ ↔ x = 0 := by simp
```

```suggestion
   the representation of the Weyl group on root space being irreducible.
```
Also, this lemma seems to be missing in this file? Is it part of future work?
Thanks, I have excised this from the module doc string: it was left over from a previous design.

Do you think the following variant could be useful?
```suggestion

@[elab_as_elim]
lemma weylGroup.induction' [Nonempty ι] {pred : (g : Aut P) → g ∈ P.weylGroup → Prop}
    (mem : ∀ i, pred (Equiv.reflection P i) (P.reflection_mem_weylGroup i))
    (mul : ∀ x y hx hy, pred x hx → pred y hy → pred (x * y) (mul_mem hx hy))
    {x} (hx : x ∈ P.weylGroup) :
    pred x hx := by
  refine weylGroup.induction P mem ?_ mul hx
  obtain ⟨i⟩ : Nonempty ι := inferInstance
  have h1 := mul _ _ (reflection_mem_weylGroup P i) (reflection_mem_weylGroup P i) (mem i) (mem i)
  have h2 : Equiv.reflection P i * Equiv.reflection P i = 1 := by
    rw [mul_eq_one_iff_inv_eq, Equiv.reflection_inv P i]
  simpa [h2] using h1

```

pullRequest.title: feat: define irreducible root systems / pairings

source.title: Implement Lusztig / Geck's construction of semisimple Lie algebras
